app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at http://www.mdpi.com/1996-1944/12/2/234/s1, Video S1: The droplet impacting process of the SAFFs, using red ink-dyed water, Video S2: The droplet impacting test of SAFFs fixed at a certain angle. The water droplets were sprayed on the surface and bounced-off quickly, suggesting the outstanding superhydrophobicity of the SAFFs.
